context.p: The WebHelp Responsive output supports dark mode, allowing users to switch between light and dark themes based on their preference or browser's settings. This feature enhances readability and reduces eye strain in low-light environments.
context.note: Both Light and Oxygen templates support dark mode, providing you with complete examples to explore.
context.p: To enable dark theming, follow these steps:
